tweet: Lincoln on C-Span says GOP is opposed to debate, want to "drop issue and walk away".  "That is not what people sent us here to do."

Blanche Lincoln says "I'm gonna do what's best for my state." Hmmm....
Blanche Lincoln seems to be on board.
